alert.note: Alert for Cascade Foothills in Lane County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 02 at 2:25PM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEAST AND NORTH CENTRAL LANE COUNTY THROUGH 300 PM PDT... At 224 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Vida, or 23 miles north of Oakridge, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Vida and Leaburg. In Oregon this includes State Highway 126 from Eugene to McKenzie Bridge between mile markers 15 and 29. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
